  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_83445</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Ultrasound waves inside a casting</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ultraschall bewegt innerhalb eines Gußteiles 
wellenartig</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les ultrasons ondulent à l'intérieur d'un 
bâti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O ultrasound acena dentro de uma carcaça</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'ultrasuono fluttua all'interno di un pezzo 
fuso</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κύματα υπερήχου μέσα σε μια ρίψη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El ultrasonido agita dentro de un bastidor</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows a casting with ultrasound waves from ultrasound source reflected and received by ultrasound detector.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">casting</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reflection</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ultrasound detector</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ultrasound source</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ultrasound waves</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt ein Gußteil mit 
Ultraschallwellen von der Ultraschallquelle, die durch 
Ultraschalldetektor reflektiert wird und empfangen ist.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre un bâti avec des 
vagues d'ultrasons de la source d'ultrasons reflétée et reçue par 
le détecteur d'ultrasons.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra uma carcaça com as 
ondas do ultrasound da fonte do ultrasound refletida e recebida pelo 
detetor do ultrasound.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra un pezzo fuso con le 
onde di ultrasuono dalla sorgente di ultrasuono riflessa e ricevuta 
dal rivelatore di ultrasuono.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει μια ρίψη με τα κύματα 
υπερήχου από την πηγή υπερήχου που απεικονίζεται και που 
παραλαμβάνεται από τον ανιχνευτή υπερήχου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra un bastidor con las 
ondas del ultrasonido de la fuente del ultrasonido reflejada y 
recibida por el detector del ultrasonido.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gußteil</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reflexion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ultraschalldetektor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">source d'ultrasons</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vagues d'ultrasons</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">rivelatore di ultrasuono</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
